movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: After being held captive, Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: The god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans, becoming one of their finest defenders.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.description: Steve Rogers transforms into Captain America and attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals stop a fanatical warrior from purging the universe.

movies.title: Ant-Man
movies.description: Armed with a super-suit, Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan a heist.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: Dr. Stephen Strange's life changes after a car accident robs him of the use of his hands.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.description: Imprisoned on the other side of the universe, Thor finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos.

tvShows.title: WandaVision
tvShows.description: The series is a blend of classic television and the Marvel Cinematic Universe in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

tvShows.title: The Falcon and The Winter Soldier
tvShows.description: Following the events of “Avengers: Endgame,” Sam Wilson/Falcon (Anthony Mackie) and Bucky Barnes/Winter Soldier (Sebastian Stan) team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities—and their patience.

tvShows.title: Hawkeye
tvShows.description: Marvel Studios’ “Hawkeye” stars Jeremy Renner as Hawkeye, who teams up with another well-known archer from the Marvel comics, Kate Bishop, played by Hailee Steinfeld.

tvShows.title: Secret Invasion
tvShows.description: In Secret Invasion, set in the present-day MCU, Fury learns of a clandestine invasion of Earth by a faction of shapeshifting Skrulls. Fury joins his allies, including Everett Ross, Maria Hill, and the Skrull Talos, who has made a life for himself on Earth.

tvShows.title: The Punisher
tvShows.description: Former marine-turned-vigilante Frank Castle (Jon Bernthal) has been living a quiet life on the road until he suddenly becomes embroiled in the attempted murder of a young girl (Giorgia Whigham).
